remarks: In a Moore system, if a set is between another set and its closure, the two sets have the same closure.  Deduction form.  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
mressmrcd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( Moore ` X ) ) $.
mressmrcd.2 $e |- N = ( mrCls ` A ) $.
mressmrcd.3 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( N ` T ) ) $.
mressmrcd.4 $e |- ( ph -> T C_ S ) $.
mressmrcd $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` S ) = ( N ` T ) ) $.
